prompt: Tell me a bio of Charles Darwin.
facts: Charles Darwin was born on February 12, 1809.
Darwin was born in Shrewsbury, England.
Darwin developed the theory of evolution by natural selection.
Darwin sailed on HMS Beagle from 1831 to 1836.
Darwin published On the Origin of Species in 1859.
Darwin married his cousin Emma Wedgwood.
Darwin is buried in Westminster Abbey.

prompt: Tell me a bio of Galileo Galilei.
facts: Galileo was born in Pisa, Italy.
Galileo discovered four moons of Jupiter.
Galileo was tried by the Roman Inquisition in 1633.
Galileo spent his final years under house arrest.
